TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XslTransformFileEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供用於選取 XML 轉換檔的設計階段使用者介面。

span.span: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting an XML transform file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取和編輯 XML 轉換檔 (.xsl) 的 URL，並將 URL 指定給控制項屬性在設計階段使用物件。An object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for a XML transform file (.xsl) and to assign the URL to a control property. 例如，控制使用類別在設計階段設定的值屬性。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用屬性產生關聯與屬性。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 當在設計介面上編輯相關聯的屬性時，設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法會使用方法，即會顯示使用者介面，以選取 URL，然後傳回已由使用者選取的 URL。The method uses the method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user. 方法會指出使用者介面的顯示樣式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. 自來定義 XML 轉換檔案的 URL 屬性的自訂編輯器。Derive a class from the to define a custom editor for an XML transform file URL property. 例如，在衍生的類別可以覆寫方法，然後再呼叫方法搭配自訂或值。For example, a derived class can override the method, and then call the method with a custom or value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立關聯的執行個體類別包含在自訂控制項的內容。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 設計介面上，編輯控制項屬性時類別可讓使用者介面，以選取和編輯屬性值的 XML 轉換檔名稱。When the control property is edited on the design surface, the class allows the user interface to select and edit an XML transform file name for the property value. [!code-csharp[WebDesigner.XslTransformFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.XslTransformFileEditor/cs/simplecontrolwithfilename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebDesigner.XslTransformFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.XslTransformFileEditor/vb/simplecontrolwithfilename.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要在選取對話方塊上顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.

value.span: 要在選取對話方塊上顯示的標題文字。

span.span: The caption text to display on the selection dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供方法呼叫時方法，這個方法會向使用者顯示 URL 的 [選取範圍] 對話方塊，在設計階段。The property is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得編輯器的 URL 篩選選項，用來篩選要顯示在 URL 選取對話方塊中的項目。

span.span: Gets the URL filter options for the editor, which is used to filter the items that appear in the URL selection dialog box.

value.span: 表示對話方塊中一或多個 URL 篩選選項的字串。

span.span: A string that represents one or more URL filter options for the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供方法呼叫時方法，這個方法會向使用者顯示 URL 的 [選取範圍] 對話方塊，在設計階段。The property is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time. 屬性的預設值表示兩個 URL 篩選器 對話方塊： 一個用於 XML 轉換檔 (\*.xsl)，另一個用於所有檔案 (\*。\*)。The property default value indicates two URL filters for the dialog box: one for XML transform files (\*.xsl) and another for all files (\*.\*). 若要指定自訂篩選條件字串，衍生自類別，然後再覆寫屬性，以傳回自訂的篩選條件字串。To specify a custom filter string, derive a class from the class, and then override the property to return the custom filter string. 篩選字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 以下是範例包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串：Following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`XML Transform Files (*.xsl)|*.xsl|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`XML Transform Files (*.xsl)|*.xsl|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以指定篩選選項中的數種篩選模式以分號區隔篩選模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 以下是範例中的第一個篩選選項會指定兩個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串：Following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom XML Transform Files (*.xs1; *.xs2)|*.xs1;*.xs2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Custom XML Transform Files (*.xs1; *.xs2)|*.xs1;*.xs2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
